title: Russia-Ukraine war: what we know on day 40, including the Bucha killings
content:
1. Russia-Ukraine war: what we know on day 40, including the Bucha killings  The Guardian
  2. Ukrainian President Zelensky's spokesperson describes apparent war crimes by Russia - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Sec. Blinken says we cannot become 'numb' to Putin's war crimes, vows 'accountability'  Fox News
  4. Bodies of 'executed people' strewn across street in Bucha as Ukraine accuses Russia of war crimes  CNN
  5. Ukraine-Russia Live News: Civilian Victims News and the Latest  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
